headline: CON EDISON TO WEBCAST INVESTOR PRESENTATION 'Delivering Reliable and Resilient Energy for the Future' ON OCTOBER 7, 2025
summary: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (NYSE: ED) will webcast an investor presentation, Delivering Reliable and Resilient Energy for the Future, from 8:30 a.m. to 10 a.m. Eastern Time on Tuesday, October 7, 2025.
